ar_mod.options.field.max_reprojected_fps: FPS limit for asynchronous reprojection. For values below 1 or above 360 limit will be disabled.
ar_mod.options.field.wrapping_mode.desc:
Specifies texture wrapping mode:
0 - GL_CLAMP_TO_BORDER
1 - GL_CLAMP_TO_EDGE
2 - GL_REPEAT
3 - GL_MIRRORED_REPEAT
Other values will be treated as 1.
ar_mod.options.field.linear_texture_filt: Enables linear texture filtering (the edges will be blurry).
ar_mod.options.field.fov_scaling.desc:
Ratio of rendered FOV to value set in settings.
The greater the value, the worse the visuals and performance, but texture wrapping is less noticeable.
ar_mod.options.field.sequence_n.desc:
Number of movement reprojection ray marching iterations.
N in the formula for partial sum of geometric series, which is equal to the maximum supported view distance.
The greater the value, the higher the maximum supported view distance, but worse performance.
ar_mod.options.field.sequence_a0.desc:
Movement reprojection ray marching first step.
A0 (or A) in the formula for partial sum of geometric series, which is equal to the maximum supported view distance.
The greater the value, the worse the visuals, but higher the maximum supported view distance.
ar_mod.options.field.sequence_r.desc:
Movement reprojection ray marching steps ratio.
R in the formula for partial sum of geometric series, which is equal to the maximum supported view distance.
The greater the value, the worse the visuals, but higher the maximum supported view distance.
ar_mod.options.field.responsive_sprintin: Make triggering sprinting more responsive by checking double forward key asynchronously.
ar_mod.options.field.responsive_flying.d: Make enabling and disabling flying more responsive by checking double jump asynchronously.
ar_mod.options.field.debug_fps_limit.des:
Sets FPS limit to the value between 1 and 9.
For other values the limit will be the same as in Minecraft video settings.
ar_mod.options.field.simulate_real_delay: Simulates real delay for limited FPS.
ar_mod.options.field.offset_x.desc: Player position X offset for movement reprojection.
ar_mod.options.field.offset_y.desc: Player position Y offset for movement reprojection.
ar_mod.options.field.offset_z.desc: Player position Z offset for movement reprojection.
ar_mod.options.field.print_async_fps.des: Prints to logs FPS values for asynchronous rendering.
Prints message to logs each time render thread waits for asynchronous reprojection thread.
